activities: Claritas Data Solutions receives or collects electronic data (in both email and electonic document form) from its direct client or third party for the purposes of providing litigation technology services to law firms and corporations.  These services include data processing and data hosting for a wide variety of legal matters.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Information Services - (INF)Legal Services - (LES)Management Consulting Services - (MCS)General Services - (GSV)
personaldata: Organization and client data is covered by the Safe Harbor Framework.  This also includes manually processed data by Claritas Data Solutions within the arena of its core business activities.
privacyprograms: Claritas Data Solutions is not currently a memeber of any privacy program.
recoursemech: The American Arbitration Association (hereinafter “AAA”) has an established process for companies certifying Safe Harbor compliance. Claritas Data Solutions will submit to the jurisdiction of the AAA in the event of a dispute or consumer complaint.
